data.message: Hey Facebook! I really miss a frame to my pictore with Type 1 Diabetes. Will you ever make that?

replies.message: Hi Martin. After creating the French flag overlay last November during the attacks on Paris, we decided to focus our efforts on creating a profile frames platform that gives nonprofit Pages the ability to create their own frames for fans to show support for a variety of causes. We’re hoping to expand this feature in the coming months in order to allow people to unify behind movements that are important to them. -Jessica
November is Internation Diabetes month -  Just have that in mind :)

Dear Sir: I would very much appreciate it if you could kindly resolve the problem that I am facing with FB for already 7 month: My FB photos part shows my various albums where I had saved many photos before, however since March 2016 when I open the albums I cannot see those photos. Therefore, I am asking you to fix the mentioned problem, since I really need those photos which, unfortunately, I didn’t save in other places. Looking forward to your prompt response, Sona Бонни Карерра (Sona Martirosyan)
